products.title: Phoenix Grey (Moisture Resistant)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure phoenix grey (moisture resistant) bathroom roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality bathroom roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 200mm max width: 3000mm (1740mm fabric turned)
 	min drop: 300mm max drop: 1490mm (2150mm fabric turned)
 	note: supplied with a white round visible bottom bar.
 	Fabric composition: pvc
 	tube: robust aluminium tube
 	control: sidewinder control only
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	fittings: included
